> <OLD>
>
> A faint light now glows from one headlight, indicating that Nightshift was
> somewhat coming around.  Yet it was hard to tell how conscious he was since
> he was stuck in vehicle mode.  Transmission, brake, and wiper fluids leak
> from beneath his frame as well as antifreeze and washer fluid.  Oil and fuel
> too seem to trickle out from beneath him.  For all intensive purposes he was
> totaled.  Not one inch of his frame appeared undamaged.
>
> " Ughh.  Can't transform.  Can't feel anything.  Can't see anything either."

<NEW>

There was a pause from RAMULUS, it sounded like he was running
something over NIGHTSHIFT. "I am a medic, but I am no doctor, we're
going to have to get you back to a CR chamber."

"Can't we just pull him into robot mode?" The voice was WOLFGANG's.
"There is a CR chamber at the back of the shuttle, but it's not going
to hold him like this."

RAMULUS replied, "I don't know. Maybe helping to get him into robot
mode will help." His uncertainty was evident in his voice.

Delicatetly RAMULUS and WOLFGANG tried to push and pull, to manuver
NIGHTSHIFT back to robot mode.

(TAG)

Preston
